SCTX - Script Source:
scn fbmwBMWerewolfPC

;PC is a Werewolf
;Todo attributes and skills modification. Uncapper required
short werestatus
short iswerewolf
short isday
short fQuestDelayTime
short isnotfirsttransf
string_var modelpath
short GetPathOnce
Array_var equippeditem
short i
ref item
ref crosshairRef
short haskilledaswere
short DoOncebloodlust
short Hircinesringwasequipped
ref potentialattacker
string_var savename
short attackclaws
short noplayothervideos
begin gamemode
	set fQuestDelayTime to 0.01
	if(GetGameLoaded)
		if(iswerewolf == 1)
			Player.SetModelPath "Characters\_male\skeletonWerewolf.nif"
			Player.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\SneakBackward_werewolf.kf" 1
			Player.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\SneakFastBackward_werewolf.kf" 1
			Player.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\SneakFastForward_werewolf.kf" 1
			Player.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\SneakFastLeft_werewolf.kf" 1
			Player.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\SneakFastRight_werewolf.kf" 1
			Player.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\SneakForward_werewolf.kf" 1
			Player.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\SneakIdle_werewolf.kf" 1
			Player.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\SneakLeft_werewolf.kf" 1
			Player.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\SneakRight_werewolf.kf" 1
			Player.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\SneakTurnLeft_werewolf.kf" 1
			Player.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\SneakTurnRight_werewolf.kf" 1
			Player.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\SwimBackward_werewolf.kf" 1
			Player.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\SwimFastBackward_werewolf.kf" 1
			Player.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\SwimForward_werewolf.kf" 1
			Player.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\SwimFastForward_werewolf.kf" 1
			Player.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\Idle.kf" 1
			Player.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\OneHandEquip.kf" 1
			Player.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\OneHandUnequip.kf" 1
			Player.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\SneakOneHandEquip.kf" 1
			Player.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\SneakOneHandUnequip.kf" 1
			Player.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\WalkForward.kf" 1
			Player.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\WalkTurnLeft.kf" 1
			Player.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\WalkTurnRight.kf" 1
			Player.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\WalkFastForward_pc_werewolf.kf" 1
			DisableControl 5
			DisableControl 7
			DisableControl 15
			DisableControl 16
			DisableControl 17
			DisableControl 18
			DisableControl 19
			DisableControl 20
			DisableControl 21
			DisableControl 22
			DisableControl 23
			DisableControl 24
			DisableControl 25
			SetNumericGameSetting fActorStrengthEncumbranceMult 9999
			if ( Player.IsThirdPerson )
				Player.Update3D
			else
				ToggleFirstPerson 0
				Player.Update3D
				ToggleFirstPerson 1
			endif
			set attackclaws  to (4)*(GetGlobalValue fbmwbmclawcost)
			SetAttackDamage attackclaws fbmwbmwerewolfclawPC
		elseif(iswerewolf == 0)
			Player.SetModelPath  $modelpath
			Player.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\SneakBackward_werewolf.kf" 0
			Player.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\SneakFastBackward_werewolf.kf" 0
			Player.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\SneakFastForward_werewolf.kf" 0
			Player.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\SneakFastLeft_werewolf.kf" 0
			Player.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\SneakFastRight_werewolf.kf" 0
			Player.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\SneakForward_werewolf.kf" 0
			Player.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\SneakIdle_werewolf.kf" 0
			Player.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\SneakLeft_werewolf.kf" 0
			Player.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\SneakRight_werewolf.kf" 0
			Player.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\SneakTurnLeft_werewolf.kf" 0
			Player.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\SneakTurnRight_werewolf.kf" 0
			Player.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\SwimBackward_werewolf.kf" 0
			Player.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\SwimFastBackward_werewolf.kf" 0
			Player.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\SwimForward_werewolf.kf" 0
			Player.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\SwimFastForward_werewolf.kf" 0
			Player.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\Idle.kf" 0
			Player.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\OneHandEquip.kf" 0
			Player.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\OneHandUnequip.kf" 0
			Player.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\SneakOneHandEquip.kf" 0
			Player.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\SneakOneHandUnequip.kf" 0
			Player.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\WalkForward.kf" 0
			Player.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\WalkTurnLeft.kf" 0
			Player.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\WalkTurnRight.kf" 0
			Player.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\WalkFastForward_pc_werewolf.kf" 0
			EnableControl 5
			EnableControl 7
			EnableControl 15
			EnableControl 16
			EnableControl 17
			EnableControl 18
			EnableControl 19
			EnableControl 20
			EnableControl 21
			EnableControl 22
			EnableControl 23
			EnableControl 24
			EnableControl 25
			SetNumericGameSetting fActorStrengthEncumbranceMult oldencoumbrancesetting
			if ( Player.IsThirdPerson )
				Player.Update3D
			else
				ToggleFirstPerson 0
				Player.Update3D
				ToggleFirstPerson 1
			endif

		endif
	endif	
	if(iswerewolf == 1)
		Let crosshairRef := GetCrosshairRef
		if(crosshairRef.IsDoor == 1)&&(crosshairRef.GetLocked == 0);To avoid being blocked in an interior if and only if there is an unlocked door .
			EnableControl 5
		else
			DisableControl 5
		endif
	endif
	if (GameHour>6) && (GameHour<21)
		set isday to 1
	else
		set isday to 0
	endif
	if(GetPathOnce == 0) && (isday == 1); to avoid savegame bloat
		Let modelpath := Player.GetModelPath
		set GetPathOnce to 1
		print"Skeleton path aquired " + modelpath
	endif
	if(haskilledaswere == 1)
		EnableControl 16
		if(Player.HasSpell  0werewolfShunger == 1)
			Player.RemoveSpellNS 0werewolfShunger
		endif 
	endif
	if (iswerewolf!=1)&&(isday!=1) && (GetStage fbmwbmLycanthropycure<20)
		Let equippeditem := Player.GetEquippedItems
		Let i := 0
		if eval ((ar_Size equippeditem) > 0)
			while i < ar_Size equippeditem
				Let item := equippeditem[i]
				Player.UnequipItemNS item
				Let i += 1
			loop				
		endif
		if(isnotfirsttransf == 0)
			PlayBink "bm_werewolf1.bik"
			set isnotfirsttransf to 1
		elseif(isnotfirsttransf == 1)&&(GetStage fbmwBMCeremony2 < 10)&&(GetStage fbmwBMCeremony1 < 10)
			PlayBink "bm_ceremony1.bik"
			SetStage fbmwBMCeremony2 10
		elseif(isnotfirsttransf == 1)&&(GetStage fbmwBMCeremony2 == 50)
			PlayBink "bm_ceremony2.bik"
			set fbmwbmclawcost to 35;Sharpen claws
			SetStage fbmwBMCeremony2 100
		elseif(isnotfirsttransf == 1)&&(GetStage fbmwBMCeremony2 == 100)&&(GetStage fbmwBMBearHunt2 < 1)&&(GetStage fbmwBMBearHunt1 < 10)
			PlayBink "bm_bearhunt1.bik"
			SetStage fbmwBMBearHunt2 10
		elseif(isnotfirsttransf == 1)&&(GetStage fbmwBMBearHunt2 == 50)
			PlayBink "bm_bearhunt2.bik"
			SetStage fbmwBMBearHunt2 100
			Player.AddSpell 0bmUsummonbonewolf
		elseif(isnotfirsttransf == 1)&&(GetStage fbmwBMBearHunt2 >=100)&&(GetStage fbmwBMFrostGiant2 <=1)&&(GetStage fbmwBMFrostGiant1 < 10)
			PlayBink "bm_frostgiant1.bik"
			SetStage fbmwBMFrostGiant2 10
		elseif(GetStage fbmwBMFrostGiant2 == 70)
			PlayBink "bm_frostgiant2.bik"
			Player.AddSpell 0bmUhunterwind
			SetStage fbmwBMFrostGiant2 100
		elseif(GetStage fbmwBMFrostGiant2 == 100)&&(GetStage fbmwBMWildHunt <= 10)
			PlayBink "bm_wereend.bik"
;	set noplayothervideos to 1
			set fbmwBMWildHunt.begin to 4
			SetStage fbmwBMWildHunt 25
			Player.Call fbmwMoveToFunct fbmwbmWildHuntTeleMarker
		else
;		if(noplayothervideos == 0)			
			PlayBink "bm_werewolf2.bik"
;		elseif(noplayothervideos == 1)
;			set noplayothervideos to 0
;		endif
		endif
		set oldencoumbrancesetting to GetGameSetting fActorStrengthEncumbranceMult
		SetNumericGameSetting fActorStrengthEncumbranceMult 9999
		Player.AddItemNS fbmwWereBodyPC 1
		Player.EquipItemSilent fbmwWereBodyPC
		Player.AddItemNS fbmwWereHeadPC 1
		Player.EquipItemSilent fbmwWereHeadPC
		Player.AddItemNS fbmwbmwerewolfclawPC 1
		Player.EquipItem fbmwbmwerewolfclawPC
		Player.AddItemNS fbmwbmWerewolfClawShieldPC 1
		Player.EquipItemSilent fbmwbmWerewolfClawShieldPC
		Player.AddSpellNS 0werewolfSregeneration
;		Player.AddSpellNS 0werewolfSvision
		Player.AddSpellNS 0werewolfSresists
		Player.SetFactionRank fbmwWereFaction 0
		Player.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\SneakBackward_werewolf.kf" 1
		Player.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\SneakFastBackward_werewolf.kf" 1
		Player.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\SneakFastForward_werewolf.kf" 1
		Player.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\SneakFastLeft_werewolf.kf" 1
		Player.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\SneakFastRight_werewolf.kf" 1
		Player.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\SneakForward_werewolf.kf" 1
		Player.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\SneakIdle_werewolf.kf" 1
		Player.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\SneakLeft_werewolf.kf" 1
		Player.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\SneakRight_werewolf.kf" 1
		Player.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\SneakTurnLeft_werewolf.kf" 1
		Player.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\SneakTurnRight_werewolf.kf" 1
		Player.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\SwimBackward_werewolf.kf" 1
		Player.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\SwimFastBackward_werewolf.kf" 1
		Player.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\SwimForward_werewolf.kf" 1
		Player.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\SwimFastForward_werewolf.kf" 1
		Player.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\Idle.kf" 1
		Player.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\OneHandEquip.kf" 1
		Player.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\OneHandUnequip.kf" 1
		Player.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\SneakOneHandEquip.kf" 1
		Player.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\SneakOneHandUnequip.kf" 1
		Player.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\WalkForward.kf" 1
		Player.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\WalkTurnLeft.kf" 1
		Player.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\WalkTurnRight.kf" 1
		Player.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\WalkFastForward_pc_werewolf.kf" 1
		Player.SetModelPath "Characters\_male\skeletonWerewolf.nif"
		if ( Player.IsThirdPerson )
			Player.Update3D
		else
			ToggleFirstPerson 0
			Player.Update3D
			ToggleFirstPerson 1
		endif
		set iswerewolf to 1
		set attackclaws  to (4)*(GetGlobalValue fbmwbmclawcost)
		SetAttackDamage attackclaws fbmwbmwerewolfclawPC
		DisableControl 5
		DisableControl 7
		DisableControl 15
		DisableControl 16
		DisableControl 17
		DisableControl 18
		DisableControl 19
		DisableControl 20
		DisableControl 21
		DisableControl 22
		DisableControl 23
		DisableControl 24
		DisableControl 25
		SetEventHandler "OnDeath" fbmwbmhandlesdeathbywerewolf "object"::Player
		Let savename:= Player.GetName + "werewolfnight"
		RunScriptLine "save $fbmwbmAAAImAWere.savename"
		sv_Destruct savename
	elseif (iswerewolf==1)&&(isday==1)
		set fQuestDelayTime to 0
		Player.RemoveItemNS fbmwWereBodyPC 1
		Player.RemoveItemNS fbmwWereHeadPC 1
		Player.RemoveItemNS fbmwbmWerewolfClawShieldPC 1
		Player.RemoveItemNS fbmwbmwerewolfclawPC 1
		Player.RemoveSpellNS 0werewolfSregeneration
;		Player.RemoveSpellNS 0werewolfSvision
		Player.RemoveSpellNS 0werewolfSresists
		Player.SetFactionRank fbmwWereFaction -1
		SetNumericGameSetting fActorStrengthEncumbranceMult oldencoumbrancesetting
		Player.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\SneakBackward_werewolf.kf" 0
		Player.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\SneakFastBackward_werewolf.kf" 0
		Player.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\SneakFastForward_werewolf.kf" 0
		Player.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\SneakFastLeft_werewolf.kf" 0
		Player.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\SneakFastRight_werewolf.kf" 0
		Player.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\SneakForward_werewolf.kf" 0
		Player.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\SneakIdle_werewolf.kf" 0
		Player.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\SneakLeft_werewolf.kf" 0
		Player.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\SneakRight_werewolf.kf" 0
		Player.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\SneakTurnLeft_werewolf.kf" 0
		Player.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\SneakTurnRight_werewolf.kf" 0
		Player.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\SwimBackward_werewolf.kf" 0
		Player.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\SwimFastBackward_werewolf.kf" 0
		Player.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\SwimForward_werewolf.kf" 0
		Player.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\SwimFastForward_werewolf.kf" 0
		Player.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\Idle.kf" 0
		Player.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\OneHandEquip.kf" 0
		Player.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\OneHandUnequip.kf" 0
		Player.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\SneakOneHandEquip.kf" 0
		Player.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\SneakOneHandUnequip.kf" 0
		Player.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\WalkForward.kf" 0
		Player.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\WalkTurnLeft.kf" 0
		Player.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\WalkTurnRight.kf" 0
		Player.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\WalkFastForward_pc_werewolf.kf" 0
		Player.SetModelPath $modelpath
		Let i := 0
		if eval ((ar_Size equippeditem) > 0)
			while i < ar_Size equippeditem
				Let item := equippeditem[i]
				Player.EquipItem2NS item
				Let i += 1
			loop				
		endif
		Let equippeditem  := ar_Null
		if ( Player.IsThirdPerson )
			Player.Update3D
		else
			ToggleFirstPerson 0
			Player.Update3D
			ToggleFirstPerson 1
		endif
		set iswerewolf to 0
		EnableControl 5
		EnableControl 7
		EnableControl 15
		EnableControl 16
		EnableControl 17
		EnableControl 18
		EnableControl 19
		EnableControl 20
		EnableControl 21
		EnableControl 22
		EnableControl 23
		EnableControl 24
		EnableControl 25
		RemoveEventHandler "OnDeath" fbmwbmhandlesdeathbywerewolf "object"::Player
	Endif
	if (iswerewolf==1)
		if(GetStage fbmwBMWildHunt < 10)||(GetStage fbmwBMWildHunt > 100)  ;experimental fix for combat
			Let potentialattacker := GetFirstRef 35  
			while (potentialattacker)
				if(potentialattacker.GetIsCreature != 1)&&(potentialattacker.GetDead == 0)  ; to avoid permanent detection values to dead npcs
					if(potentialattacker.GetDetectionLevel Player == 3)&&(potentialattacker.GetInFaction fbmwbmWerewolfFaction == 0) ; so they will attack only when they "see" you
						if(potentialattacker.GetActorValue Aggression >= potentialattacker.GetDisposition Player); to avoid being attacked by non morroblivion npcs
							potentialattacker.StartCombat Player
						endif
					endif
				endif

				Let potentialattacker := GetNextRef
			loop
		endif
	endif  ; End experiment
End
Begin MenuMode 1002;This and below are for ensure that you cannot open menus during werewolf mode. Commented for testing purposes
	if(iswerewolf == 1)	
		CloseAllMenus
	endif
End
Begin MenuMode 1003
	if(iswerewolf == 1)	
		CloseAllMenus
	endif
End
Begin MenuMode 1022
	if(iswerewolf == 1)	
		CloseAllMenus
	endif
End
Begin MenuMode 1023
	if(iswerewolf == 1)	
		CloseAllMenus
	endif
End
